title: The fight for women's prayer rights in Israel
description: How a group of Jewish feminists demanded the same prayer rights as Jewish men.

description: The population of Barga in Tuscany is usually swelled by visits from Scottish Italians every summer.

title: Switzerland gets ready to vote on ending free movement with EU
description: Switzerland isn't in the EU, but it does enjoy access to free trade - on condition of it also having free movement.

title: Coronavirus: Children behind rising demand for tests in England
description: Three times as many children under nine were tested in early September as in the previous two weeks.

description: A top health expert says an "unimaginable" death toll is possible, even if vaccines are developed.

description: Activist and businesswoman Yandy Smith-Harris shares her reaction to the Breonna Taylor case decision.

description: A year on from the firm’s collapse, many staff are still out of work while others have set up businesses.

title: Kim Jong-un apologises for killing of South Korean official - South
